00029 extern unsigned char application_display(bit init);
00030 extern void user_write(unsigned char index) reentrant;
00031 extern MSCB_INFO_VAR code variables[];
00032 extern SYS_INFO sys_info;
00033 extern bit flash_param, reboot;
00034 
00035 extern bit b0, b1, b2, b3;     // buttons defined in scs-1000.c
00036 extern unsigned char idata n_variables;
00037 
00038 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00039 
00040 bit startup = 1;               // true for the first 3 seconds
00041 bit in_menu = 0;               // false for application display
00042 bit system_menu = 0;           // true if in system menu
00043 bit enter_mode = 0;            // true if editing vars
00044 unsigned char var_index = 0;   // variable to display
00045 
00046 idata float f_var;
00047

00050 typedef struct {
00051    unsigned char id;
00052    char name[4];
00053 } NAME_TABLE;
00054 
00055 NAME_TABLE code prefix_table[] = {
00056    {PRFX_PICO, "p",},
00057    {PRFX_NANO, "n",},
00058    {PRFX_MICRO, "\344",},
00059    {PRFX_MILLI, "m",},
00060    {PRFX_NONE, "",},
00061    {PRFX_KILO, "k",},
00062    {PRFX_MEGA, "M",},
00063    {PRFX_GIGA, "G",},
00064    {PRFX_TERA, "T",},
00065    {0}
00066 };

00073    {UNIT_MINUTE, "m",},

00094    {UNIT_FACTOR, "x",},
00095    {0}

00100 unsigned char n_sysvar = 4;
00101 
00102 MSCB_INFO_VAR code sysvar[] = {
00103 
00104    { 2, UNIT_WORD, 0, 0, 0, "Node Adr", &sys_info.node_addr, 1, 0xFFFE, 1 },
00105    { 2, UNIT_WORD, 0, 0, 0, "Grp Adr",  &sys_info.group_addr, 1, 0xFFFE, 1 },
00106 
00107    { 0, UNIT_BOOLEAN, 0, 0, MSCBF_DATALESS, "Flash" },
00108    { 0, UNIT_BOOLEAN, 0, 0, MSCBF_DATALESS, "Reboot" },
00109 
00110 };

00112 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00113 
00114 void display_value(MSCB_INFO_VAR *pvar, void *pd)
00115 {
00116    unsigned char i, unit_len;
00117    char idata str[10];
00118    
00119    lcd_goto(10, 0);
00120 
00121    if (pvar->unit == UNIT_STRING) {
00122       strncpy(str, (char *)pd, 8);
00123       puts(str);
00124    } else {
00125 
00126       str[0] = 0;
00127 
00128       /* evaluate prefix */
00129       if (pvar->prefix) {
00130          for (i = 0; prefix_table[i].id; i++)
00131             if (prefix_table[i].id == pvar->prefix)
00132                break;
00133          if (prefix_table[i].id)
00134             strcat(str, prefix_table[i].name);
00135       }
00136    
00137       /* evaluate unit */
00138       if (pvar->unit) {
00139          for (i = 0; unit_table[i].id; i++)
00140             if (unit_table[i].id == pvar->unit)
00141                break;
00142          if (unit_table[i].id)
00143             strcat(str, unit_table[i].name);
00144       }
00145 
00146       unit_len = strlen(str);
00147 
00148       switch (pvar->width) {
00149       case 0:
00150          puts("          ");
00151          break;
00152 
00153       case 1:
00154          if (pvar->flags & MSCBF_SIGNED)
00155             printf("%b*bd", 10-unit_len, *((char *) pd));
00156          else
00157             printf("%b*bu", 10-unit_len, *((unsigned char *) pd));
00158          break;
00159 
00160       case 2:
00161          if (pvar->flags & MSCBF_SIGNED)
00162             printf("%b*d", 10-unit_len, *((short *) pd));
00163          else
00164             printf("%b*u", 10-unit_len, *((unsigned short *) pd));
00165          break;
00166 
00167       case 4:
00168          if (pvar->flags & MSCBF_FLOAT)
00169             printf("%b*.3f", 10-unit_len, *((float *) pd));
00170          else {
00171             if (pvar->flags & MSCBF_SIGNED)
00172                printf("%b*ld", 10-unit_len, *((long *) pd));
00173             else
00174                printf("%b*lu", 10-unit_len, *((unsigned long *) pd));
00175          }
00176          break;
00177       }
00178 
00179       puts(str);
00180    }
00181 }
00182 
00183 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00184 
00185 void var_inc(MSCB_INFO_VAR *pvar, char sign)
00186 {
00187    if (pvar->unit == UNIT_STRING)
00188       return;
00189 
00190    switch (pvar->width) {
00191    case 0:
00192       return;
00193       break;
00194 
00195    case 1:
00196       if (pvar->flags & MSCBF_SIGNED) {
00197          *((char *) &f_var) += pvar->delta * sign;
00198          if (*((char *) &f_var) < pvar->min)
00199             *((char *) &f_var) = pvar->min;
00200          if (*((char *) &f_var) > pvar->max)
00201             *((char *) &f_var) = pvar->max;
00202       } else {
00203          if (sign == -1 && *((unsigned char *) &f_var) == pvar->min)
00204             break;
00205          *((unsigned char *) &f_var) += pvar->delta * sign;
00206          if (*((unsigned char *) &f_var) < pvar->min)
00207             *((unsigned char *) &f_var) = pvar->min;
00208          if (*((unsigned char *) &f_var) > pvar->max)
00209             *((unsigned char *) &f_var) = pvar->max;
00210       }
00211       break;
00212 
00213    case 2:
00214       if (pvar->flags & MSCBF_SIGNED) {
00215          *((short *) &f_var) += pvar->delta * sign;
00216          if (*((short *) &f_var) < pvar->min)
00217             *((short *) &f_var) = pvar->min;
00218          if (*((short *) &f_var) > pvar->max)
00219             *((short *) &f_var) = pvar->max;
00220       } else {
00221          if (sign == -1 && *((unsigned short *) &f_var) == pvar->min)
00222             break;
00223          *((unsigned short *) &f_var) += pvar->delta * sign;
00224          if (*((unsigned short *) &f_var) < pvar->min)
00225             *((unsigned short *) &f_var) = pvar->min;
00226          if (*((unsigned short *) &f_var) > pvar->max)
00227             *((unsigned short *) &f_var) = pvar->max;
00228       }
00229       break;
00230 
00231 
00232    case 4:
00233       if (pvar->flags & MSCBF_FLOAT) {
00234          f_var += pvar->delta * sign;
00235          if (f_var < pvar->min)
00236             f_var = pvar->min;
00237          if (f_var > pvar->max)
00238             f_var = pvar->max;
00239       } else {
00240          if (pvar->flags & MSCBF_SIGNED) {
00241             *((long *) &f_var) += pvar->delta * sign;
00242             if (*((long *) &f_var) < pvar->min)
00243                *((long *) &f_var) = pvar->min;
00244             if (*((long *) &f_var) > pvar->max)
00245                *((long *) &f_var) = pvar->max;
00246          } else {
00247             if (sign == -1 && *((unsigned long *) &f_var) == pvar->min)
00248                break;
00249             *((unsigned long *) &f_var) += pvar->delta * sign;
00250             if (*((unsigned long *) &f_var) < pvar->min)
00251                *((unsigned long *) &f_var) = pvar->min;
00252             if (*((unsigned long *) &f_var) > pvar->max)
00253                *((unsigned long *) &f_var) = pvar->max;
00254          }
00255       }
00256       break;
00257    }
00258 }
00259 
00260 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00261 
00262 void display_name(unsigned char index, MSCB_INFO_VAR *pvar)
00263 {
00264    char idata str[10];
00265 
00266    /* display variable name */
00267    lcd_goto(0, 0);
00268    memcpy(str, pvar->name, 8);
00269    str[8] = 0;
00270    printf("%2bd:%s", index, str);
00271    puts("        ");
00272 }
00273 
00274 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00275 
00276 void lcd_menu()
00277 {
00278    static idata unsigned long last_disp = 0, last_b2 = 0, last_b3 = 0;
00279    static bit b0_old = 0, b1_old = 0, b2_old = 0, b3_old = 0;
00280    MSCB_INFO_VAR *pvar;
00281    unsigned char i;
00282 
00283    /* clear startup screen after 3 sec. */
00284    if (startup) {
00285       if(time() > 300) {
00286          startup = 0;
00287          lcd_clear();
00288       } else
00289         return;
00290    }
00291 
00292    /* do menu business only every 100ms */
00293    if (time() > last_disp+10) {
00294       last_disp = time();
00295 
00296       if (system_menu)
00297          pvar = &sysvar[var_index];
00298       else
00299          pvar = &variables[var_index];
00300 
00301       if (!in_menu) {
00302 
00303          /* if not in menu, call application display */
00304          if (application_display(0))
00305             in_menu = 1;
00306       
00307       } else {
00308 
00309          if (enter_mode) {
00310 
00311             /* display variables */
00312             display_value(pvar, &f_var);
00313             lcd_goto(0, 1);
00314             puts("ESC ENTER   -    + ");
00315 
00316             /* evaluate ESC button */
00317             if (b0 && !b0_old)
00318                enter_mode = 0;
00319 
00320             /* evaluate ENTER button */
00321             if (b1 && !b1_old) {
00322                enter_mode = 0;
00323                memcpy(pvar->ud, &f_var, pvar->width);
00324                
00325                if (system_menu) {
00326                   /* flash new address */
00327                   if (var_index == 0 || var_index == 1)
00328                      flash_param = 1;
00329                } else {
00330                   user_write(var_index);
00331 #ifdef SCS_1000
00332                   if (variables[var_index].flags & MSCBF_REMOUT)
00333                      send_remote_var(var_index);
00334 #endif
00335                }
00336             }
00337 
00338             /* evaluate "-" button */
00339             if (b2 && !b2_old) {
00340                var_inc(pvar, -1);
00341                last_b2 = time();
00342             }
00343             if (b2 && time() > last_b2 + 70)
00344                var_inc(pvar, -1);
00345             if (!b2)
00346                last_b2 = 0;
00347 
00348             /* evaluate "+" button */
00349             if (b3 && !b3_old) {
00350                var_inc(pvar, 1);
00351                last_b3 = time();
00352             }
00353             if (b3 && time() > last_b3 + 70)
00354                var_inc(pvar, 1);
00355             if (!b3)
00356                last_b3 = 0;
00357 
00358          } else {
00359             
00360             /* display variables */
00361             display_name(var_index, pvar);
00362             display_value(pvar, pvar->ud);
00363             lcd_goto(0, 1);
00364 
00365             if (pvar->delta > 0 || (pvar->flags & MSCBF_DATALESS))
00366                puts("ESC ENTER  PREV NEXT");
00367             else
00368                puts("ESC        PREV NEXT");
00369    
00370             /* evaluate ESC button */
00371             if (b0 && !b0_old) {
00372                if (system_menu) {
00373                   system_menu = 0;
00374                   var_index = 0;
00375                } else {
00376                   in_menu = 0;
00377                   application_display(1);
00378                }
00379             }
00380    
00381             /* evaluate ENTER button */
00382             if (b1 && !b1_old) {
00383 
00384                if (pvar->width <= 4 && pvar->width > 0) {
00385                   enter_mode = 1;
00386                   memcpy(&f_var, pvar->ud, pvar->width);
00387                }
00388 
00389                /* check for flash command */
00390                if (system_menu && var_index == 2) {
00391                   flash_param = 1;
00392                   lcd_clear();
00393                   lcd_goto(0, 0);
00394                   puts("Parameters written");
00395                   lcd_goto(0, 1);
00396                   puts("to flash memory.");
00397                   delay_ms(3000);
00398                }
00399  
00400                /* check for reboot command */
00401                if (system_menu && var_index == 3)
00402                   reboot = 1;
00403             }
00404 
00405             /* evaluate prev button */
00406             if (b2 && !b2_old) {
00407                if (var_index == 0)
00408                  var_index = n_variables-1;
00409                else
00410                  var_index--;
00411                last_b2 = time();
00412             }
00413             if (b2 && time() > last_b2 + 70) {
00414                if (var_index == 0)
00415                  var_index = n_variables-1;
00416                else
00417                  var_index--;
00418             }
00419             if (!b2)
00420                last_b2 = 0;
00421 
00422             if (system_menu)
00423                i = n_sysvar;
00424             else
00425                i = n_variables;
00426 
00427             /* evaluate next button */
00428             if (b3 && !b3_old) {
00429                var_index = (var_index + 1) % i;
00430                last_b3 = time();
00431             }
00432             if (b3 && time() > last_b3 + 70)
00433                var_index = (var_index + 1) % i;
00434             if (!b3)
00435                last_b3 = 0;
00436 
00437             /* check for system menu */
00438             if (b2 && b3 && !system_menu) {
00439                var_index = 0;
00440                system_menu = 1;
00441             }
00442          }
00443       }
00444 
00445       b0_old = b0;
00446       b1_old = b1;
00447       b2_old = b2;
00448       b3_old = b3;
00449    }
00450 }
